title: [BDXLUA]帮忙看看这个lua有什么问题
author: Jasonzyt
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Jasonzyt 于 2020-6-15 16:32 编辑 

如题\n不知道啥玩意，代码发出来没缩进（本人lua小白，犯了低级错误勿喷）
--自定义有回档权限的玩家
--player=JasonZYT
player1 = "JasonZYT"
player2 = ""
player3 = ""
player4 = ""
player5 = ""
player6 = ""
player7 = ""
player8 = ""
player9 = ""
player0 = ""
--下面的不要动
function awa()
bcText("§c即将开始回档！",0)
bcText("§c即将开始回档！",3)
end
function java()
bcText("Loading -- 0%",0)
bcText("Loading -- 0%",3)
end
function html()
bcText("Loading -- 100%",0)
bcText("Loading -- 100%",3)
end
function python()
bcText("§b回档倒计时5秒",0)
bcText("§b回档倒计时5秒",3)
end
function lua()
bcText("§b回档倒计时4秒",0)
bcText("§b回档倒计时4秒",3)
end
function dll()
bcText("§b回档倒计时3秒",0)
bcText("§b回档倒计时3秒",3)
end
function cpp()
bcText("§b回档倒计时2秒",0)
bcText("§b回档倒计时2秒",3)
end
function jvav()
bcText("§b回档倒计时1秒",0)
bcText("§b回档倒计时1秒",3)
end
function php()
bcText("§cSever Stop!",0)
bcText("§cSever Stop!",3)
end
function JasonZYT()
runCmd('stop')
os.execute('sh back.sh | tee -a back.log')
end
